title.en: Itsuwari no Hanayome Reijou to Kieta Kaichuudokei

altTitles.ja-ro: Itsuwari no Hanayome Reijou to Kieta Kaichuudokei

altTitles.ja: 偽りの花嫁令嬢と消えた懐中時計

description.en:
Alicia is the daughter of the Baron Darren family, which has fallen into ruin due to the failure of her father's business. Alicia learns that it was the notorious Earl Walter who has taken back her father's pocket watch, which was her father's most prized possession, and put the baron family into a huge debt. and vows to take revenge. Alicia is the governess of Count Walter, one of the most powerful aristocrats in the Kingdom of Rendaria. Alicia has been infiltrated into the Count's family under a false identity to become the governess of his younger sister. Alicia is told that Count Walter is a devilish man who is dirty with money and arrogant, but when she meets him, she finds a handsome man with cold blue eyes. Alicia is bewildered and confronts him about his educational policy for her younger sister, Carol, when suddenly Count Walter...! The book contains the first four volumes of "The False Bride and the Missing Pocket Watch".

(google translated)
